snippet: Educational achievement, a healthy population, political participation and economic opportunity depend in significant ways on how we structure and manage our spreading digital frontier.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Ford Foundation president Luis A Ubinas notes there has been very little progress on issue of making quality Internet connections available to all American schools;  holds educational achievement, healthy population and economic opportunity depend in significant ways on how nation structures and manages spreading digital frontier.
lead_paragraph: Educational achievement, a healthy population, political participation and economic opportunity depend in significant ways on how we structure and manage our spreading digital frontier.

headline.main: Our Schools, Cut Off From the Web
headline.print_headline: Our Schools, Cut Off From the Web
